comments:

Can you reproduce this?

Could add isDisposed() checks to MenuManager.fill.
However, we haven't seen this on other platforms.
May indicate an SWT problem.

See also bug 18899 which has a similar stack (its second one) and is also only 
on Linux.

Note 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14463 ***
